title: Drawing, "Studies of Squash Vine", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, pen and ink on yellow tracing paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 5
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Horizontal sheet depicting two studies of squash vine with leaves, tendrils and blossoms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of Squash Vine", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, pen and ink on yellow tracing paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-31.
